name: Specials 2
description:
Specials is an organic explorative connection and growth system, currently releasing its voracious veins on the Tezos blockchain.

Specials 2 was created with someone specific in mind. The person named in Specials 2 was chosen by our dear friend @VonDoyl, who was named in Specials 1. 
The piece contains the Twitter handle (mostly obscured) of an artist, collector, or friend. If all editions are collected, the name will be revealed on Twitter in a WIP pic. 
The legend/reprobate named in the piece gets two things:

1) An edition airdropped. If he/she has already collected one, they can choose to get the airdrop, or name someone else it should go to.

2) They nominate the name to be contained in the next piece.

One edition will be held aside for the first person to correctly guess who is named in the piece. If no guesses, the edition will become available. 

The name in this piece is fully obscured because it kept showing up in reflections all over the place! 
But there are a couple solid hints to be found. Not saying they're easy to spot. They aren’t. But a combination of abstract and logical thought could possibly get you there. If you fall, be tough like a Texas oil man. Pick yourself up and brush yourself off. Anything stands in your way, squash it… or squish it. Whatever will turn it into something divine, something more than it was, with liquidity, to help you set a course. Very well. At ease.

2000x2000 300 ppi. Edition of 11 @ 1 tez. Follow: @kellybrnz
